short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FOCUS is an extension that prevents you from procrastinating with different tabs. It's never been easier to stay on task.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Eliminate your procrastination by blocking distracting tabs for FREE!

You can select tabs that you are actively working into groups and the extension will prevent you from navigating to other distracting tabs, helping you stay on track.  

It will change the DOM contents of tabs that may be a distraction for you, ensure that you'll always stay on task when the extension is active! 

-----------------------------------------------

❗FEATURES

✏️ Add tabs that you would like to focus on
✏️ Create Block and Allow List to Block and Allow Tabs.
✏️ Use a Pomodoro Timer to block tabs for a certain time.
✏️ Use different Themes to decorate your Dashboard

--------------------------------------------------
Install FOCUS today and transform your work session experience. Unleash the power of effective tab management and boost your productivity to new heights!
